questions.question: The convective heat transfer coefficient in laminar flow over a flat plate

answers.b: Increases if a higher viscosity fluid is used
answers.c: Increases if a denser fluid is used
answers.d: Decreases with increase in free stream velocity

explanations.c: It mostly increases if a denser fluid is used.

questions.question:
For laminar flow over a flat plate, the average value of a Nusselt number is prescribed by the relation
Nu = 0.664 (Re) 0.5 (Pr) 0.33 Which of the following is then a false statement?

answers.a: Density has to be increased four times
answers.b: Plate length has to be decreased four times
answers.c: Specific heat has to be increased four times
answers.d: Dynamic viscosity has to be decreased sixteen times

questions.difficulty: The dynamic viscosity has an inverse relation to 1/6 power. To double the convective heat transfer coefficient, the dynamic viscosity has to be decreased 64 times.

questions.question: Heat transfer ____________is conventionally known as convection heat transfer.

answers.b: between a surface and a fluid

questions.question: If the fluid movement is accelerated by an external device such as a fan or pump, then the process is known as?
What do you mean by forced convection evaporator?

answers.b: This has fan to remove vapor from the surface
answers.c: There is an agitator to mix the heated fluid
answers.d: There is an agitator to mix the heating medium such as steam
